structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

text.section: refrigerators, refrigerator-freezers and freezers which can be operated by alternating current electricity, excluding the following types: those designed to be used without doors; those which do not include a compressor and a condensor unit as an integral part of the cabinet assembly; refrigerators and refrigerator-freezers with total refrigerated volume exceeding thirty-nine cubic feet; top mounted refrigerator-freezers with total refrigerated volume less than sixteen and six-tenths cubic feet; and freezers with total refrigerated volume exceeding thirty cubic feet.
storage type electric, gas and oil water heaters.
fluorescent ballasts for F40T12 and F96T12 lamps.
luminaires with fluorescent ballasts for F40T12 and F96T12 lamps.
single-voltage external AC to DC power supplies.
